entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind becoming east 30 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
